articles.title: 'Get used to it': Outbreaks give Americans taste of living with virus - CTV News
articles.description: The U.S. is getting a first glimpse of what it's like to experience COVID-19 outbreaks during this new phase of living with the virus, and the roster of the newly infected is studded with stars.

articles.title: Bank of America analyst warns 'recession shock' to hit US economy - Daily Mail
articles.description: Michael Hartnett, chief investment strategist for Bank of America, warned clients on Friday of a looming 'recession shock' in the US economy as the Fed tries to tame rampant inflation.
articles.content: A Bank of America analyst warned that the U.S. economy is deteriorating fast and could push the country into a recession just three days after Deutsche Bank predicted the fall to come in 2023 as the … [+7977 chars]
